testimonials_section.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials_section.comment: Amazing service! The electrician was professional and fixed my fan in 30 minutes. Very satisfied with the quality of work.

testimonials_section.name: Raj Patel
testimonials_section.comment: Quick response and fair pricing. The plumber arrived on time and solved my pipe leakage issue efficiently.

testimonials_section.name: Anita Gupta
testimonials_section.comment: Great painting job! They completed my living room in just 2 days. The finish quality is excellent.
